titleStmt.title: W. Hayslip et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG4463

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: To the Hon Govnor of Kentucky

We the undersigned sitizens of Edmonson county would respecfully call your attention to a fine against, Garret Vincent for the sum of twenty dollars for the offese of Gaming at a game called Chuckyluck Mr Vincent is a poor man and need the benefit of his labors and is a man that does not follow gaming but he through amusement did bet one five cents on a game and we would desire your honor to remit said fine.

Yours Truly
W Hayslip
James crawford
T, J, Sweeney
W. H. Willis
W H, Clark
James Lock
M. Hayslip
Braxton Keeton
James Madison
Levi Edwards
A L Edwards
P. S.. Hayslip
James Reed
John W Bailey
Amos James
G, W, Cook
M, C, Hayslip
J, H, Harvey
Danl Kinser,
M; M Logan
L D kash
W K Walker
Aron Larson

Garret Vincent
Pet for remission
Refused Decr 3 1863
